Package com.gsm.controller.api

Class SaleOrderApiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.controller.api.SaleOrderApiController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/sale-orders")
public class SaleOrderApiController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST Controller that provides API endpoints for the Sale Order user interface. These endpoints are called by frontend JavaScript to fetch dynamic data, enabling a richer user experience on the sale order form.

      • getProducts

        @GetMapping("/products")
public java.util.List<SaleOrderApiController.ProductInfo> getProducts()
        API endpoint to get a list of all products for dropdowns.
        Returns:
        A list of products, simplified into a ProductInfo structure.

      • getSaleOrderDetails

        @GetMapping("/{saleOrderNo}/details")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>>> getSaleOrderDetails​(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String saleOrderNo)
        API endpoint to get the style and color details of an existing sale order.
        Parameters:
        saleOrderNo - The unique number of the sale order.
        Returns:
        A list of maps, each containing a style and color.

      • getProductColors

        @GetMapping("/product-colors")
public java.util.List<SaleOrderApiController.ColorInfo> getProductColors​(@RequestParam
                                                                         java.lang.Long productId)
        API endpoint to fetch a distinct list of colors available for a given product.
        Parameters:
        productId - The ID of the product.
        Returns:
        A list of ColorInfo objects.

      • getProductSizes

        @GetMapping("/product-sizes")
public java.util.List<SaleOrderApiController.SizeInfo> getProductSizes​(@RequestParam
                                                                       java.lang.Long productId,
                                                                       @RequestParam
                                                                       java.lang.String color)
        API endpoint to get available sizes for a specific product and color combination.
        Parameters:
        productId - The ID of the product.
        color - The selected color.
        Returns:
        A list of SizeInfo objects, including variant ID and price.

      • getNextOrderNo

        @GetMapping("/next-order-no")
public java.lang.String getNextOrderNo​(@RequestParam
                                       java.lang.String customerCode)
        API endpoint to generate the next sequential sale order number for a customer.

        Logic: It counts existing orders for the customer and appends the next number (e.g., CUSTOMER-CODE-00001).

        Parameters:
        customerCode - The code of the selected customer.
        Returns:
        A string representing the suggested next sale order number.
